hero.title: The Architects of Your Change
hero.subtitle: Moving is not just chaos in boxes. It is a complex technical project. We plan, manage, and execute.

area.title: Service Areas
area.description: FLOXANT is headquartered in Düsseldorf. Our operational hub is in Regensburg and the Upper Palatinate. From here, we serve clients throughout Bavaria and offer long-distance moves across Germany.
area.hub_note: FLOXANT is headquartered in Düsseldorf. Our operational hub is in Regensburg and the Upper Palatinate. From here, we serve clients throughout Bavaria and offer long-distance moves across Germany.

headings.upgrades_title: Would you like a bit more?
headings.upgrades_subtitle: Our Signature Services for your comfort.
headings.success_message: Thank you, {name}. We have received your request and are checking capacities.
headings.success_email: A confirmation has been sent to {email}.

umzug_muenchen.hero_desc: Stress-free to the Bavarian capital or from Munich to the world. FLOXANT offers premium moving services with a fixed price guarantee.
umzug_muenchen.intro_title: Moving in Munich – With Plan and Precision
umzug_muenchen.intro_text_1: Munich is a vibrant metropolis attracting people from all over the world. However, moving in the Bavarian capital often presents a logistical challenge. Narrow staircases in Schwabing, missing parking spaces in the Glockenbachviertel, or strict time windows in residential complexes: The conditions require experience and good planning.
umzug_muenchen.intro_text_2: FLOXANT stands for a moving service that masters exactly these challenges. We don't just start working; we plan your relocation in detail. Our goal is for you to sit back and relax while we do the heavy lifting.
umzug_muenchen.transparency_text: FLOXANT has its legal headquarters in Düsseldorf. However, our distinct team operates regularly for moves in Munich and the entire surrounding area. We combine the flexibility of a supra-regional provider with the reliability you expect. Additionally, we routinely organize long-distance moves from Munich to North Rhine-Westphalia and all other federal states.

city.title: City Moves Munich
city.desc: Fast and efficient within the city area. We know the routes and organize no-parking zones if needed.

remote.title: Long-Distance Moves from Munich
remote.desc: From the Isar to the Rhine or Spree. Our long-distance moves are logistically optimized and secure.

clearance.title: Clearance
clearance.desc: Professional disposal of old furniture during apartment dissolutions in Munich. Broom-clean handover guaranteed.

umzug_muenchen.details_title: Munich Special: What to Watch Out For
umzug_muenchen.details_text: Every city has its peculiarities, and Munich is no exception. Parking is tight in many quarters. For a smooth process, setting up an official no-parking zone is often essential. We are happy to handle the application with the Munich authorities for you, including setting up signs in good time.
umzug_muenchen.remote_title: Move from Bavaria to All of Germany
umzug_muenchen.remote_text: Many of our customers move professionally from Munich to other metropolitan regions like Düsseldorf, Cologne, Frankfurt, or Berlin. Especially with such long-distance moves, professional planning is essential. We ensure that your inventory arrives safely packed, insured, and on time at the destination. Thanks to our regular tours between Bavaria and NRW, we can often offer attractive co-loading options or efficient direct trips.
umzug_muenchen.pricing_text: Munich is expensive enough – your move shouldn't ruin you financially. At FLOXANT, we rely on absolute cost transparency. Instead of vague hourly rates, you generally receive a fixed-price offer from us. This includes all services we discussed in advance. No hidden fees for floor surcharges or travel distances.

features.inspection: Free Inspection: We are happy to inspect your moving goods in advance via video call. This saves time and allows for precise calculation.
features.insurance: Insurance Included: Your furniture is in safe hands with us and fully covered.
features.staff: Qualified Personnel: Our staff are experienced, friendly, and work carefully.

umzug_muenchen.cta_text: Start your request now. We will create a non-binding offer for your move in, to, or from Munich at short notice.

service_umzug.meta_desc: FLOXANT accompanies your private move with precision and discretion. From Regensburg – for all of Bavaria and across Germany.
service_umzug.hero_desc: A move is more than transport. It is a transition. FLOXANT accompanies this process discreetly, methodically, and reliably.
service_umzug.intro_title: Your Move – Thoughtfully Planned to the Last Detail
service_umzug.intro_p1: A private move touches every aspect of life. Personal belongings, treasured mementos, delicate furniture – everything requires individual attention. At FLOXANT, we understand that your home is more than an address. It is part of your identity. That is why we plan every relocation so you can focus on what truly matters: your new chapter.
service_umzug.intro_p2: Our team operates with a clear process that provides full transparency at every stage. From the initial assessment to the last box placed in your new home – we leave nothing to chance. Our operational hub is in Regensburg and the Upper Palatinate. From here, we serve clients throughout Bavaria and across Germany.
for_whom_items: Individuals and families who value careful handling
Residential moves within a city or region
Relocations requiring special protection for valuables

process_steps.title: Assessment
process_steps.desc: Complimentary survey – on-site or via video call. We record volume, special requirements, and your preferences.

process_steps.title: Fixed-Price Offer
process_steps.desc: You receive a transparent quote with no hidden costs. What is agreed upon stands.

process_steps.title: Execution
process_steps.desc: Professional packing, secure transport, punctual delivery. Our teams work carefully and quietly.

process_steps.title: Handover
process_steps.desc: Assembly, placement, and a broom-clean finish at the old location. Your new home is move-in ready.

guarantees: Full insurance for your entire inventory
service_umzug.cta_text: Start your move with a personal quote. Discreet, transparent, and without obligation.

service_buero_umzug.meta_desc: FLOXANT organises your office move with minimal downtime. Structured, discreet, and on schedule – from Regensburg for all of Bavaria.
service_buero_umzug.hero_desc: Business continuity demands planning. We ensure your company is fully operational at the new location without delay.
service_buero_umzug.intro_p1: An office move intervenes in active business processes. IT infrastructure, sensitive documents, workplace ergonomics – every detail must be right. FLOXANT plans your commercial relocation so your employees can work productively the very next morning.
service_buero_umzug.intro_p2: We coordinate all trades: from IT disconnection through physical transport to reinstallation. Discretion is a given – particularly for sensitive industries such as law firms, medical practices, and financial services.
for_whom_items: Businesses of any size with active operations
Law firms, practices, and offices handling sensitive records
Companies that must minimise downtime

process_steps.title: Project Planning
process_steps.desc: Detailed analysis of your office layout. Timeline, responsibilities, and milestones are defined.

process_steps.title: Coordination
process_steps.desc: Liaison with your IT team, facility management, and landlord. Everything from a single source.

process_steps.title: Execution
process_steps.desc: Relocation within defined time windows – including evenings or weekends. Minimally invasive.

process_steps.title: Commissioning
process_steps.desc: Workstation setup, functionality testing, and handover. Your team can start immediately.

guarantees: Defined time windows with guaranteed compliance
Insurance coverage for IT equipment and inventory
Discreet handling without disrupting business operations
service_buero_umzug.cta_text: Let us structure your corporate relocation together. Contact us for a confidential consultation.

service_fernumzug.meta_title: Long-Distance Moving – Across Germany and Europe
service_fernumzug.meta_desc: FLOXANT organises long-distance moves from Bavaria to any city in Germany. Logistically optimised, insured, and on time.
service_fernumzug.hero_desc: Distance is no obstacle. We connect Regensburg, Bavaria, and all of Germany with logistics that accept no compromise.
service_fernumzug.intro_p1: A long-distance move requires a different quality of planning. Longer transport routes, changing road conditions, and coordinating at two locations simultaneously – all of this must function seamlessly. FLOXANT specialises in this complexity.
service_fernumzug.intro_p2: Whether from Regensburg to Hamburg, Munich to Berlin, or Bavaria to North Rhine-Westphalia: our team plans routes, arranges interim storage when needed, and ensures your belongings arrive safely and on time.
for_whom_items: Individuals with career-related relocations
Families moving to a different city
Companies transferring employees

process_steps.title: Route Planning
process_steps.desc: Optimal routing considering traffic, weather, and time windows.

process_steps.title: Packing
process_steps.desc: Professional packing with specialist materials for long-distance transport.

process_steps.title: Transport
process_steps.desc: GPS-monitored transport with experienced drivers. Insurance coverage for the entire journey.

process_steps.title: Delivery
process_steps.desc: On-time delivery, assembly, and placement at the new location.

guarantees: Fixed-price offer for the entire distance
Full insurance throughout the entire transport
Delivery guarantee with defined time windows
service_fernumzug.cta_text: Where would you like to go? Start your enquiry and receive a tailored offer for your long-distance move.

service_reinigung.meta_title: Professional Cleaning – Final Cleaning and Handover
service_reinigung.meta_desc: FLOXANT offers professional final cleaning to landlord standards. For Regensburg, Bavaria, and across Germany.
service_reinigung.hero_desc: Cleanliness is not a detail – it is the foundation for an orderly conclusion and a clear new beginning.
service_reinigung.intro_p1: The final cleaning of a property is often the decisive factor for a smooth deposit return. FLOXANT works to clearly defined landlord standards and documents the result. This gives you confidence at handover.
service_reinigung.intro_p2: Our cleaning team works thoroughly, swiftly, and respectfully with your property. Whether after a move, before moving in, or as a standalone service – we leave spaces in a condition that leaves no questions unanswered.
for_whom_items: Tenants before property handover
Owners before sale or re-letting
Commercial premises at end of lease

process_steps.title: Inspection
process_steps.desc: Assessment of condition and definition of cleaning scope.

process_steps.title: Execution
process_steps.desc: Systematic cleaning of all rooms, floors, windows, and sanitary facilities.

process_steps.title: Quality Control
process_steps.desc: Acceptance by checklist. Photo documentation for your records.

process_steps.title: Handover
process_steps.desc: Broom-clean handover, ready for the landlord or next tenant.

service_reinigung.cta_text: Secure a professional final cleaning. Transparently calculated and on schedule.

service_entruempelung.meta_desc: FLOXANT clears residential and commercial properties professionally. Clearance in Regensburg, Bavaria, and across Germany.
service_entruempelung.hero_desc: Letting go requires trust. We clear professionally, discreetly, and with environmental responsibility.
service_entruempelung.intro_p1: Clearance is more than removing objects. Often there are emotional decisions behind it – whether after a bereavement, during a household dissolution, or at the start of a new chapter. FLOXANT approaches these situations with respect and sensitivity.
service_entruempelung.intro_p2: We separate professionally, dispose of items in an environmentally responsible way, and leave broom-clean spaces. Recyclable materials are recycled; usable items can be donated upon request. You receive complete documentation of all disposal.
for_whom_items: Household dissolutions and estate clearances
Commercial clearances at business closure
Individuals wishing to professionally part with accumulated items

process_steps.title: Walk-Through
process_steps.desc: Joint inventory. You decide what stays, what goes, and what is donated.

process_steps.title: Clearing
process_steps.desc: Systematic clearing of all agreed areas by our trained team.

process_steps.title: Disposal
process_steps.desc: Professional separation and disposal in compliance with legal requirements.

process_steps.title: Final State
process_steps.desc: Broom-clean handover of the property. Documentation upon request.

service_entruempelung.cta_text: Contact us for a confidential consultation. We will provide a transparent quote.

service_montage.meta_title: Assembly – Professional Furniture and Kitchen Installation
service_montage.meta_desc: FLOXANT assembles furniture, kitchens, and fittings professionally. In Regensburg, Bavaria, and across Germany.
service_montage.hero_desc: Precision in detail. Professional assembly and disassembly of your furniture and kitchens – with the care your furnishings deserve.
service_montage.intro_p1: Quality furniture and kitchens deserve professional assembly. Wrong handling can damage surfaces, impair functionality, or shorten lifespan. FLOXANT exclusively employs trained personnel experienced with a wide range of assembly systems.
service_montage.intro_p2: Whether IKEA shelving or bespoke designer kitchens – we work carefully, cleanly, and respectfully with your property. After assembly, we leave the workspace tidy and take packaging material with us on request.
for_whom_items: Individuals after a move or new purchase
Commercial clients with office fit-outs
Kitchen installation during renovation or first occupancy

process_steps.title: Preparation
process_steps.desc: Review of assembly instructions and materials. We bring all tools and accessories.

process_steps.title: Assembly
process_steps.desc: Professional installation considering room geometry and usage.

process_steps.title: Function Test
process_steps.desc: Testing of all moving parts, drawers, and mechanisms.

process_steps.title: Final Check
process_steps.desc: Cleaning of workspace and disposal of packaging material.

guarantees: Careful handling of surfaces and materials
service_montage.cta_text: Professional assembly without compromise. Contact us for a quote.

service_halteverbotszone.meta_title: No-Parking Zone – Official Permit and Setup
service_halteverbotszone.meta_desc: FLOXANT applies for and sets up no-parking zones. Official processing for Regensburg, Bavaria, and across Germany.
service_halteverbotszone.hero_desc: Clear access is the foundation of every smooth move. We handle the official permit process for you.
service_halteverbotszone.intro_title: No-Parking Zones – Timely and Legally Compliant
service_halteverbotszone.intro_p1: In many urban areas – especially in the city centres of Regensburg, Munich, or Nuremberg – setting up an official no-parking zone is essential for a smooth move. Without reserved parking, you lose valuable time and risk delays.
service_halteverbotszone.intro_p2: FLOXANT handles the entire process: application to the relevant authority, installation of signs with the legally required lead time, and removal after your move. You need not worry about a thing.
for_whom_items: Moves in city-centre locations without private parking
Commercial moves requiring larger vehicle access
Any relocation that requires guaranteed access

process_steps.title: Application
process_steps.desc: Submission to the relevant traffic authority with all required documents.

process_steps.title: Approval
process_steps.desc: Follow-up and confirmation of the permit.

process_steps.title: Installation
process_steps.desc: Placement of no-parking signs with legally required lead time (min. 72 hours).

process_steps.title: Removal
process_steps.desc: Removal of signs after the move is complete.

guarantees: Full-service with no effort on your part
service_halteverbotszone.cta_text: Secure clear access for your moving day. We handle the entire organisation.

reinigung_regensburg.meta_title: Cleaning Regensburg – Professional Final Cleaning in the Upper Palatinate
reinigung_regensburg.meta_desc: FLOXANT offers professional final cleaning in Regensburg and surroundings. Broom-clean handover to landlord standards. Discreet and reliable.
reinigung_regensburg.hero_desc: Regensburg is our operational hub. Here, we know the standards of local property managers and landlords. Our cleaning teams follow a structured process that leaves nothing to question.
reinigung_regensburg.intro_title: Final Cleaning in Regensburg – Our Core Territory
reinigung_regensburg.intro_p1: As the operational base of FLOXANT, Regensburg is the centre of our cleaning services. Our teams know the particular requirements of local housing associations, cooperatives, and private landlords. Whether a period property in the Old Town, an apartment in the Kasernenviertel, or a new build on the Brandlberg – we know what matters at handover.
reinigung_regensburg.intro_p2: Our final cleaning follows a documented process with checklist and photo documentation. This puts you on safe ground during handover. We work thoroughly, punctually, and respectfully with your property.

end_cleaning.title: Final Cleaning
end_cleaning.desc: Complete cleaning of the property to landlord standards. Including floors, windows, kitchen, and sanitary facilities.

construction_cleaning.title: Post-Construction Cleaning
construction_cleaning.desc: Professional cleaning after renovation or conversion. Dust, paint residue, and debris are completely removed.

office_cleaning.title: Office Cleaning
office_cleaning.desc: Regular or one-off cleaning of commercial premises. Discreet and outside business hours.

reinigung_regensburg.cta_text: Secure an appointment for your professional cleaning in Regensburg. Transparently calculated and reliable.

entruempelung_regensburg.meta_title: Clearance Regensburg – Professional Clearing in the Upper Palatinate
entruempelung_regensburg.meta_desc: FLOXANT clears residential and commercial properties in Regensburg professionally. Environmentally responsible disposal, discreet handling.
entruempelung_regensburg.hero_desc: Letting go is a process. We accompany it in Regensburg and surrounding areas with respect, care, and professional disposal.
entruempelung_regensburg.intro_title: Clearance in Regensburg – On-Site and Personal
entruempelung_regensburg.intro_p1: Regensburg is our operational centre, and this is precisely where we are strongest. Whether a household dissolution after a bereavement, clearing before renovation, or simply the wish for a fresh start – we act quickly, discreetly, and responsibly.
entruempelung_regensburg.intro_p2: Our team separates professionally on-site, disposes of items in an environmentally responsible way through certified partners, and leaves broom-clean spaces. Usable items can be donated to social institutions in Regensburg at your request.

household.title: Household Dissolution
household.desc: Complete clearing of private residences. Discreet and sensitive for estate clearances.

commercial.title: Commercial Clearing
commercial.desc: Professional clearing of offices, warehouses, and business premises at business closure.

partial.title: Partial Clearance
partial.desc: Targeted clearing of individual rooms or areas. You decide what stays.

entruempelung_regensburg.cta_text: Contact us for a discreet consultation. We will provide a transparent quote for your clearance in Regensburg.

buero_umzug_regensburg.meta_title: Office Move Regensburg – Professional Business Relocation in the Upper Palatinate
buero_umzug_regensburg.meta_desc: FLOXANT organises office moves in Regensburg. Minimal downtime, IT-safe relocation, on-schedule execution.
buero_umzug_regensburg.hero_desc: Business continuity is the priority. We relocate your office in Regensburg with system, discretion, and minimal downtime.
buero_umzug_regensburg.intro_title: Office Moves in Regensburg – Our Core Territory
buero_umzug_regensburg.intro_p1: Regensburg is growing steadily as a business location. With the Conti Campus, TechBase, and numerous mid-sized companies in the region, demand for professional office moves is rising. FLOXANT, with its operational base in Regensburg, has the local expertise you need.
buero_umzug_regensburg.intro_p2: We coordinate your office relocation so your team can work productively the very next business day. IT equipment is transported securely, sensitive documents handled discreetly, and all workstations set up to your specifications.

full_move.title: Complete Relocation
full_move.desc: Full relocation of all office units, IT infrastructure, and inventory.

it_relocation.title: IT Relocation
it_relocation.desc: Professional disconnection and reconnection of servers, network infrastructure, and workstations.

weekend_move.title: Weekend Move
weekend_move.desc: Execution outside business hours for zero downtime.

buero_umzug_regensburg.cta_title: Plan Your Office Move in Regensburg
buero_umzug_regensburg.cta_text: Let us plan your office move in Regensburg together. Confidential, structured, and on schedule.

sig_ritual_exit.meta_title: Ritual Exit Box – A Conscious Farewell to Your Home
sig_ritual_exit.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Ritual Exit Box accompanies you through a conscious farewell. A personal ritual for the transition into a new chapter.
sig_ritual_exit.hero_desc: Leaving a home means closing a chapter. The Ritual Exit Box gives this moment the space it deserves.
sig_ritual_exit.story_title: Why a Farewell Deserves a Ritual
sig_ritual_exit.story_p1: Every home carries memories. The first night, cooking together, quiet moments by the window. When we leave, we do not just leave rooms behind – we leave a part of our story. The Ritual Exit Box is our answer to a transition that is too often overlooked.
sig_ritual_exit.story_p2: Inside the box you will find a small ceremony: a candle, a handwritten guide, and a sealable envelope for a final letter to this place. It is not a product. It is a gesture.
sig_ritual_exit.purpose_text: Conscious transitions reduce the emotional stress of a move. The Ritual Exit Box creates a defined moment of letting go – calm, personal, and dignified.
sig_ritual_exit.for_whom_text: For anyone who does not simply leave their home but wishes to say goodbye. Especially valuable for long-term residences, family homes, or shared living spaces.
sig_ritual_exit.cta_text: Complement your move with a Ritual Exit Box. Mention it when submitting your enquiry.

sig_clean_start.meta_title: Clean Start Ceremony – Consciously Move into Your New Home
sig_clean_start.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Clean Start Ceremony prepares your new apartment for a conscious move-in. Professional cleaning as the foundation for a fresh start.
sig_clean_start.hero_desc: Before you arrange your furniture, we prepare your new space – physically and atmospherically.
sig_clean_start.story_title: A New Beginning Starts with Clarity
sig_clean_start.story_p1: A new home should feel like yours from the very first second. Not like the space of a predecessor. The Clean Start Ceremony is a professional deep clean that goes beyond the ordinary.
sig_clean_start.story_p2: We do not just clean surfaces – we create an atmosphere. After cleaning, the space is ventilated and subtly prepared. When you step in, you enter your space.
sig_clean_start.purpose_text: A clean, prepared space signals to your subconscious: something new begins here. The Clean Start Ceremony makes this transition tangible.
sig_clean_start.for_whom_text: For move-ins to existing properties, after renovations, or for anyone who wishes to consciously take possession of their new space.
sig_clean_start.cta_text: Prepare your move-in. Mention the Clean Start Ceremony when submitting your enquiry.

sig_neighbour_kit.meta_title: New Neighbour Kit – Professional Neighbourhood Introduction
sig_neighbour_kit.meta_desc: The FLOXANT New Neighbour Kit eases your arrival in the new neighbourhood. Discreet, charming, and thoughtfully crafted.
sig_neighbour_kit.hero_desc: First impressions matter – including with your new neighbours. Our kit turns your arrival into a positive moment.
sig_neighbour_kit.story_p1: In a new environment, one initially feels like a stranger. The New Neighbour Kit bridges this first distance elegantly. It contains a personalised greeting card and a small token of appreciation for your immediate neighbours.
sig_neighbour_kit.story_p2: We prepare the kit and deliver it on your move-in day upon request. You leave a positive first impression – without having to think about it yourself.
sig_neighbour_kit.purpose_text: Good neighbourly relations begin on day one. The kit creates a foundation for mutual respect and reduces the social barrier of a new beginning.
sig_neighbour_kit.for_whom_text: For families, couples, or individuals moving into a multi-unit building who wish to build a positive relationship with their neighbours from the start.
sig_neighbour_kit.cta_text: Complement your move with the New Neighbour Kit. We take care of the details.

sig_first_48h.meta_title: First 48h Package – The First Two Days Worry-Free
sig_first_48h.meta_desc: The FLOXANT First 48h Package supplies you with everything you need in the first two days after your move. No searching, no stress.
sig_first_48h.hero_desc: The first hours in your new home are decisive. We ensure you can settle in immediately.
sig_first_48h.story_p1: After a move, the household is in a state of emergency. Where is the coffee machine? Where are the towels? The First 48h Package contains everything you need for the first two days: hygiene products, snacks, basic cleaning supplies, and a checklist for the most important tasks.
sig_first_48h.story_p2: The package is ready when you enter your new home. No searching, no improvising – simply arrive.
sig_first_48h.purpose_text: The first 48 hours determine how a move is emotionally evaluated. Those who are immediately functional experience the transition as positive rather than burdensome.
sig_first_48h.for_whom_text: For anyone who wishes to be immediately functional after a move. Especially valuable for singles, professionals, or families with children.
sig_first_48h.cta_text: Start relaxed in your new home. We prepare the package for your move-in.

sig_bureaucracy.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Bureaucracy Shield handles official formalities around your move. No-parking zones, re-registration, mail forwarding.
sig_bureaucracy.hero_desc: Official visits and formalities are part of every move. We take this burden from you – completely and legally compliant.
sig_bureaucracy.story_title: Bureaucracy Need Not Be Your Concern
sig_bureaucracy.story_p1: A move brings a wave of formalities: applying for a no-parking zone, re-registering your address, setting up mail forwarding, notifying utility providers. The Bureaucracy Shield bundles all these tasks and handles them for you.
sig_bureaucracy.story_p2: Our team is familiar with procedures across Regensburg and all of Bavaria. We know the relevant offices, the forms, and the deadlines. You receive complete documentation of all completed steps.
sig_bureaucracy.purpose_text: Bureaucracy is one of the greatest stress factors in relocations. Delegating to experienced professionals reduces errors, saves time, and gives you certainty.
sig_bureaucracy.for_whom_text: For individuals and companies who wish to focus on their move and delegate formalities to experienced hands.
sig_bureaucracy.cta_text: Delegate the formalities. We handle the official processing for you.

sig_furniture_opt.meta_title: Furniture Optimisation – Space Planning After Your Move
sig_furniture_opt.meta_desc: FLOXANT Furniture Optimisation helps you place your furnishings perfectly in new spaces. Professional space planning included.
sig_furniture_opt.hero_desc: Placing furniture instead of merely putting it down. We optimise the arrangement of your furnishings for the new space.
sig_furniture_opt.story_p1: Old furniture in new rooms – it does not always fit immediately. Furniture Optimisation analyses your furnishings in the context of the new floor plan and suggests an optimal arrangement. Natural light, walkways, and room proportions inform the planning.
sig_furniture_opt.story_p2: Our team implements the optimisation directly on moving day. So you experience your new space not as a compromise, but as a thoughtfully arranged home.
sig_furniture_opt.purpose_text: A well-considered room arrangement enhances living quality and well-being. The optimisation prevents provisional solutions from becoming permanent.
sig_furniture_opt.for_whom_text: For anyone moving existing furnishings into a differently proportioned space and wishing to make the best of the situation.
sig_furniture_opt.cta_text: Have your new space professionally arranged. We plan the optimal layout.

sig_cleaning_guarantee.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Cleaning Guarantee assures broom-clean handover. If your landlord has complaints, we re-clean – free of charge.
sig_cleaning_guarantee.hero_desc: Broom-clean handover – guaranteed. Should your landlord have complaints, we re-clean. Free of charge.
sig_cleaning_guarantee.story_p1: Property handover is often the most stressful moment after a move. Will the deposit be returned in full? Will there be complaints? The Cleaning Guarantee takes this worry from you. We clean to our defined standards and stand behind our work.
sig_cleaning_guarantee.story_p2: Should your landlord identify legitimate cleaning deficiencies within 14 days of handover, we return and rectify them – at no additional cost.
sig_cleaning_guarantee.purpose_text: The Cleaning Guarantee protects your deposit and gives you negotiating confidence at handover. It documents professional diligence.
sig_cleaning_guarantee.for_whom_text: For all tenants who wish for a stress-free property handover and want to receive their full deposit back.
sig_cleaning_guarantee.cta_text: Secure your handover. The Cleaning Guarantee can be added to any move.

sig_storage_rot.meta_title: Storage Rotation – Flexible Interim Storage for Your Move
sig_storage_rot.meta_desc: FLOXANT Storage Rotation offers secure interim storage with flexible access. Ideal for staged moves and renovations.
sig_storage_rot.hero_desc: Not everything needs to move at once. Our Storage Rotation gives you temporal flexibility.
sig_storage_rot.story_title: Interim Storage as a Strategic Tool
sig_storage_rot.story_p1: Sometimes schedules do not align: the old property must be vacated, but the new one is not yet ready. Or you are renovating and need temporary space for your belongings. Storage Rotation solves this timing challenge.
sig_storage_rot.story_p2: Your items are stored securely at our partner facility in the Regensburg region. You can arrange access and request partial deliveries whenever it suits you.
sig_storage_rot.purpose_text: Flexibility in scheduling reduces pressure and enables better decisions. Storage Rotation decouples move-out and move-in.
sig_storage_rot.for_whom_text: For anyone whose moving dates are not synchronised, or who needs space during a renovation.
sig_storage_rot.cta_text: Secure flexible interim storage. We advise on the possibilities.

sig_kids_box.meta_title: Kids Moving Box – Making Moves Child-Friendly
sig_kids_box.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Kids Moving Box makes moving an adventure for children. Activity materials, an explanatory booklet, and a personal surprise.
sig_kids_box.hero_desc: Children experience a move differently from adults. Our box turns the transition into a positive experience.
sig_kids_box.story_title: A Move Through a Child's Eyes
sig_kids_box.story_p1: For children, a move means uncertainty: the familiar room disappears, friends are left behind, everything changes. The Kids Moving Box accompanies this process in an age-appropriate way with activity materials, a small explanatory booklet about moving, and a personal surprise for the first day in the new room.
sig_kids_box.story_p2: The box is handed over before moving day so children can prepare and actively participate – as an adventure, not a loss.
sig_kids_box.purpose_text: Children who are actively included in the moving process cope better with the change. The box gives them a role and makes the transition tangible.
sig_kids_box.for_whom_text: For families with children aged 3 to 12 who wish to make the move child-friendly.
sig_kids_box.cta_text: Make the move a positive experience for your children. We prepare the box individually.

sig_service_24h.meta_title: 24h Moving Service – Available Around the Clock
sig_service_24h.meta_desc: FLOXANT 24h Moving Service for urgent and time-sensitive relocations. Available evenings, nights, and weekends.
sig_service_24h.hero_desc: Sometimes a move cannot wait. Our 24h service is ready when you need us – even outside regular hours.
sig_service_24h.story_p1: Not every move fits into regular business hours. Short-notice terminations, professional transfers, or personal circumstances sometimes demand swift action. The 24h Moving Service guarantees availability in the evenings, at night, and on weekends.
sig_service_24h.story_p2: Our standby team is ready at short notice. The same quality, the same care – regardless of the hour.
sig_service_24h.purpose_text: Time pressure is one of the greatest stress factors in relocations. The 24h service eliminates the time constraint and gives you maximum flexibility.
sig_service_24h.for_whom_text: For urgent moves, time-sensitive relocations, or clients who can only move outside business hours for professional reasons.
sig_service_24h.cta_text: Contact us at any time. We are there for you – around the clock.

sig_ladies_team.meta_title: Ladies Team – Moving by an All-Female Team
sig_ladies_team.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Ladies Team offers moves exclusively by female personnel. Discreet, respectful, and professional.
sig_ladies_team.hero_desc: Some situations call for particular sensitivity. Our Ladies Team offers moves exclusively by female personnel.
sig_ladies_team.story_p1: There are situations in which clients feel more comfortable with an all-female team: after a separation, due to religious or cultural preferences, or simply as a personal choice. The Ladies Team respects these wishes without question and at no extra charge.
sig_ladies_team.story_p2: Our female moving team works with the same professionalism and efficiency as all our teams. The only difference: the composition.
sig_ladies_team.purpose_text: The Ladies Team creates a protected environment for the move. It respects personal boundaries and cultural needs – discreetly and naturally.
sig_ladies_team.for_whom_text: For female clients who prefer an all-female team for personal, cultural, or religious reasons.
sig_ladies_team.cta_text: Book your move with our Ladies Team. Discreet, professional, and at no extra charge.

sig_memory_capsule.meta_title: Memory Capsule – Preserving Moments During Your Move
sig_memory_capsule.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Memory Capsule preserves a moment from your old home. Photos, notes, and personal items in a sealed capsule.
sig_memory_capsule.hero_desc: Some places deserve to be remembered. The Memory Capsule captures a moment – for ever.
sig_memory_capsule.story_p1: Before the last box is packed, we pause. The Memory Capsule contains photos of the empty rooms, a note of your choice, and a small object from the old home. Everything is sealed in a high-quality capsule.
sig_memory_capsule.story_p2: This capsule is not meant to be opened immediately. It is an anchor – a physical object that captures a place in time. Open it whenever you are ready.
sig_memory_capsule.purpose_text: Memories fade over time. The capsule preserves a defined moment and makes it accessible again at any time.
sig_memory_capsule.for_whom_text: For people leaving a place that meant a great deal to them. Especially valuable for family homes or properties with a long history.
sig_memory_capsule.cta_text: Preserve a moment from your old home. We prepare the capsule on moving day.

sig_maybe_box.meta_title: The Maybe Box – Decision Aid During Your Move
sig_maybe_box.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Maybe Box gives you time for uncertain decisions. Keep or let go? Decide later.
sig_maybe_box.hero_desc: Not every decision must be made immediately. The Maybe Box gives you time for the difficult questions.
sig_maybe_box.story_p1: During a move, countless decisions are demanded simultaneously: keep, give away, store? For many items the answer is clear. But for some it is not. The Maybe Box is designed for exactly these cases.
sig_maybe_box.story_p2: We store items you are unsure about for up to 90 days. During that time, you can decide at leisure whether to keep or let go. Without pressure. Without haste.
sig_maybe_box.purpose_text: Decisional overload during a move leads to regrettable choices. The Maybe Box decouples the physical process of moving from the emotional process of letting go.
sig_maybe_box.for_whom_text: For anyone finding it difficult to part with certain items immediately and needing time for a considered decision.
sig_maybe_box.cta_text: Give yourself time for the difficult decisions. We store items in the Maybe Box until you are ready.

sig_key_handover.meta_title: Key Handover – Documented and Secure Property Handover
sig_key_handover.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Key Handover documents the property handover securely. Professional protocols and visual evidence for your protection.
sig_key_handover.hero_desc: Documented. Secure. Traceable. Professional protocols for landlords and visual evidence for your peace of mind.
sig_key_handover.story_p1: The key handover marks the official closing of a chapter. But too often it happens hurriedly, without documentation. The Key Handover service creates a professional protocol of the property condition, photographs all rooms, and documents the handover of all keys.
sig_key_handover.story_p2: You receive a complete documentation package that serves as proof in the event of subsequent disputes. This is not merely a formality – it is your legal safeguard.
sig_key_handover.purpose_text: A documented handover protects both parties. It creates clarity about the condition of the property and prevents subsequent disputes over the deposit.
sig_key_handover.for_whom_text: For all tenants and landlords who value a legally secure, documented property handover.
sig_key_handover.cta_text: Document your property handover professionally. We create a complete protocol for your records.

services_section.title: Our Services
services_section.subtitle: Tailored solutions for every need. Whether private, commercial, or specialized.

items.title: Private Move
items.desc: Carefree into your new home. We take care of everything.

items.title: Office Move
items.desc: Minimal downtime for your business. Professional planning.

items.title: Long-Distance Move
items.desc: Safely to your destination Europe-wide. We connect cities and countries.

items.title: Clearance
items.desc: Broom-clean clearance of apartments and business premises.

items.title: Assembly
items.desc: Professional assembly and disassembly of your furniture and kitchens.

items.title: No-Parking Zone
items.desc: Official approval and setup of zones.

signature_services.title: Signature Services
signature_services.subtitle: More than just logistics. We take care of the emotional and organizational details of your new beginning.

ritual_exit.title: Ritual Exit Box
ritual_exit.desc: A conscious farewell. We accompany the transition with loving keepsakes and farewell items to close a chapter of life calmly.

clean_start.title: Clean Start Ceremony
clean_start.desc: The moment of arrival. After cleaning, we prepare your new home atmospherically – with order, freshness, and a sense of calm.

neighbour_kit.title: New Neighbour Kit
neighbour_kit.desc: Arriving in the environment. Our Neighbour Kit eases entry into the neighborhood – stylish, restrained, and respectful.

first_48h.title: First 48h Package
first_48h.desc: Stability in the first hours. We set up the bedroom, bathroom, and kitchen immediately so your daily life can start without delay.

bureaucracy.title: Bureaucracy Protection
bureaucracy.desc: Less paper. More focus. We handle registrations, contracts, and organizational steps in a structured and reliable manner.

furniture_opt.title: Furniture Optimization
furniture_opt.desc: Function meets aesthetics. We assemble, place, and optimize according to spatial logic and lighting – functional, calm, and visually balanced.

cleaning_guarantee.title: Cleaning Guarantee
cleaning_guarantee.desc: Cleanliness with security. Final cleaning according to clearly defined landlord standards, documented for a smooth deposit return.

storage_rot.title: Storage Rotation
storage_rot.desc: Store flexibly. Decide clearly. We store things securely and return them when needed – ideal for seasonal use or transitional phases.

kids_box.title: Kids Moving Box
kids_box.desc: A move from a child's perspective. With their own box, we provide orientation, structure, and a positive experience for the little ones.

service_24h.title: 24h Moving Service
service_24h.desc: When time is the factor. Discreet, efficient moves within 24 hours. Fast, controlled, and professional.

ladies_team.title: Ladies Team
ladies_team.desc: Trust in sensitive situations. A team for special security and calm – supplemented by male strength for heavy lifting if needed.

memory_capsule.title: Memory Capsule
memory_capsule.desc: Preserve what matters. A stylish box for personal items from the old home – protected and consciously kept.

maybe_box.title: The Maybe Box
maybe_box.desc: Postpone decisions. We store uncertain items until you are ready to let go or keep. Without pressure. Without chaos.

key_handover.title: Key Handover
key_handover.desc: Documented. Secure. Traceable. Professional protocols for landlords and visual evidence for your security.
